content.detailedDescription:
I saw orange light in the southwest.  i thought it was a helicopter because it was moving slow coming toward me.  i noticed no lights were blinking and that the light was pulsating. 

it flew straight over my head and never made a sound.  the orange glow fizzled out and i could make out a metallic orb.  it disappeared into clouds.  the whole event lasted 2 minutes.  by the time i was ready to video it with my smartphone, it was gone.

later that night, i saw helicopters circling.  also heard the sound of thunder from a distant storm, but the rumbling of the thunder abruptly ended instead of gradually rolling.  weird. 

this was not a plane or helicopter or drone.  it was not a comet, i have seen plenty of them.  i cannot explain what it was, but it did not move very fast.
content.summary: Orange orb, glowing silent, glow fizzled out into metallic orb.  lost in clouds. it flew straight.

content.detailedDescription: It was 2:30-2:45pm pst june 28th, 2015. fortcast was sunny with about 40% clouds.I was cresting a peak on my mountain bike on spr ridge trail in laguna, ca. 33.557038, -117.797068 all of a sudden this disk shaped object appeared out of the north-east hovering overhead. it moved in short busts in sort of a random zig zag pattern. as the object moved it appeared the object sort of tilted slightly in the direction it was heading. it was completely silent. it was a sunny day and the lights were very bright. the lights were a white-blue color that appeared to be made of many small squares that covered the circumference of the edge of the disk. the lights moved around the circumference of the disk in short waves. i was stunned as to what i was looking at. i tried to picture it as being some sort of balloon or advance military jet (i've been to many air force bases)and it was unlike anything i have ever seen. i was slow to react but pulled my camera out before it was out of my sight. i was able to snap one picture. i rode very fast up to the top of the ridge and watched it move toward this location, 33.556073, -117.762938. then it hovered for a few seconds and took off vertically disappearing. i kept looking around for a while and did not see anything else. there was nobody else around me. i only took one photo, three of the photos attached have been zoomed in.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown object

content.detailedDescription:
June 24 2015 9:10 am

driving west on mira mar road, i'm constantly looking up into the sky to see the fighter jets taking off and practicing maneuvers and such when i noticed something off into the distance that what appeared to be some white looking object that i thought looked like a military plane but when i kept on looking at it, seemed to have cloaked and then appeared again.  i thought that maybe it had turned and faded into the skylight.  i saw it again only to see it kind of fading away that's when i decided to pull over and snap a shot with my camera phone. as soon as i snapped the shot i looked outward again and it was gone.

 when i down loaded the picture onto my laptop, i couldn't see anything that stood out immediately.  it wasn't until i enlarged the picture that i could see an image distorted in a lower area of picture.  

i bet if you invert the picture to a negative image you'd be able to see it.

that's my story.
content.summary: Anomaly over mira mar marine corp air station - fighter jets scrambled

content.detailedDescription:
I was speaking with one of my lts at night after being on a range all day preparing for a deployment to afghanistan.  we both had something catch our eyes which i thought was a tracer round from some type of weapon system since it moved about that fast.  the night had very low clouds completely covering the sky.  the object went directly over both of our heads and was way too large to be any type of tracer round i have ever seen.  as i looked up at it the clouds were illuminated by the light but i could clearly see through the clouds (as they were the foggy type) and saw a brilliant circular white light with a small green light bordering the entire perimeter of the white light.  it was so bright that the clouds around it were illuminated like the moon does to clouds.  it moved very fast and kept going until it either went out of site or disappeared.  my lt and i both looked at it other in disbelief and i asked him what did he think it was.  he said he had no idea and i jokingly said something about ufos.  we continued our conversation and about ten minutes later made way to the rest of my company to bed down for the night on the range.  we started talking again about the light we had saw and another soldier said him and another had witnessed it too.  i asked him what did he think it was and they said they had no idea.  a total of four soldier witnessed the light.  myself the commander (cpt), a 2lt, a sfc, and a ssg.  i had a picture of the range it was on and don't remember direction the light went, but the picture is still at the company i commanded. i lost the original due to a hard drive failure.  i did not report the event and have kept quite until now and based on the recent event decided to report both of them.  

the exact date i would know if i saw the picture again as i imprinted the date and the event had happened the night before.
content.summary: Bright light moving fast over camp ripley, mn

content.detailedDescription: Due to previous sighting (which i will report next) i always look up at the sky when i go outside.  on 22 jun 15 at 2335 hrs i went to smoke a cigarette on my back porch.  a storm was brewing to the east but the sky at my home was clear except for two really high clouds.  the stars were visible.  i noticed a small oval or circular cloud moving at a faster than normal speed with edges that appeared to be glowing slightly.  at first i thought it might be the moon but the moons angle was already setting in the west.  the 'cloud' went directly over my head and house and continued in a straight line north.  i looked at it and could not see all the way through it but it didn't appear to be anything but a cloud.  i thought it was odd enough that i grabbed my 10 million candlepower spotlight to see if the cloud might reflect that and walked through the house to the front porch telling my wife about it on the way.  on the front porch i shined the light at the cloud but the beam covered the entire cloud.  i turned the light on and off four times just to see if it was anything.  i laid down the spotlight on the porch railing and when i looked up was shocked to see a bright light had appeared in and was shining clearly through the cloud.  (it almost looked like the headlights of a plane but bigger and brighter and in an upside down bubble siren shape).  i called to my wife to come and look at it.  it continued north, not blinking, not making any sound and the small cloud followed the light the entire time although there were no other low level clouds in my area.  as me and my wife observed the object it went north over the trees but before it did the light grew dim and appeared to 'blend' back into the cloud with just the edges slightly glowing again.  a few minutes afterwards i noticed three planes fairly close to each other going from the east toward the direction of where the object would be.  although we live over a flight path there are two directions that are usually flown and none of the plane every look or sound like this.  i checked the hubble and iss locations and they were below the horizon.
content.summary: Initially cloud with glowing edges

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front steps watching the venus-jupiter conjunction when i noticed something approaching from the north. it flew straight south over my area appearing to be 300 feet above and traveling approximately 50-70 mph.It was a glowing orange ball with a bright white light that looked like it was inside it.I watched it until it got out of range.The whole event was less than 2 minutes.
content.summary: Very strange glowing orb flew over at moderate speed 50-70 mph. i watched it until i could not make it out anymore

content.detailedDescription: For me i see them almost nightly some nights i don't but me and my wife will always walk to bayless park or lookout point and that's when the light show starts the white and reddish disks and i have a good sense of judgement from plains to red balls that appear and shimmer not blink and when they dull you notice a disk shape some go in straight paths with moment pauses in between it's linear movement a lot of times plains will fly by or a helicopter witch makes them disappear and some i truly believe is are government for example i was seeing a bunch of white orbs in the sky and then i seen a white and red flashing lights like a plane but was moving really slow then i watched what i thought was a plane eject a white orb that's shot to the west as far as the eye could see leavening a white trailthat disappeared and i also have weird feelings towards my dreams to i don't dream much but when i do i wake up forgetful as hell and often depressed without reason and when i walk under street lights they often shut off and has for years with me and my wife and when i put headphones or put phones up to my ear i notice they start to burn and i don't know why and i do have un explained marks sometimes and once i woke up with what looked like a needle mark on my ribs and that was 3 4 years ago and the needle looking mark is still left in the form of a bruise that has never went away and i'm sure it's nothing just curious and feel like it's time i finally message you so someone can tell me or help me out why some people would kill to see them and never have but it's effortless for me to find them they just come to me
content.summary: Hello my name is [name removed/cms/tg]. me and my wife "a" have seen a lot of ufo activitie over the last 3 year's and for some reason we never have to try to look for them but it almost never fails they will just appeare either in white or redish orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard smoking a cigarette when the lights caught my eye. they were similar in appearance to stars but only brighter and larger. there were two of them, a larger one with another smaller light above and to the left of them. as i watched them the larger one started to fade away, within about 4 seconds it had disappeared. that really caught my attention. within 30 seconds it returned in the same way it left. the second, smaller light then followed suit. i immediately called to my dad to come look at it and i could tell that after watching for some time he was as shocked and confused as i was. we both took photos and video with our phones, but never really got a good picture of what we were seeing. it just showed up as a bright light. maybe if someone can enhance them it will become clear. i kept trying to rationalize it but no explanations were coming to me. it went on like this for another hour. they would even sometimes disappear together, only to light up again. after it faded away for the last time i was left grasping for answers. that's when i came across this site, and the pictures from case 67409. they are exactly  the same formation as the one i just witnessed, but even better quality. i will never forget this.
content.summary: Two lights in sky fading in and out. hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
Left christiana around 930pm. headed roughly west and watched the lights the whole time.

two lights, one large and bright, the other small. smaller light was up and to the left of the larger light. they sat largely still. eventually the larger light winked and flickered, then finally faded, followed by the smaller light. the lights then came back and seemed to begin to approach the horizon. lost sight of them beyond the trees.

noticed report of the same lights, with photo, from connecticut around the same time.
content.summary: Two lights in the sky to the west

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at the texas instruments campground on lake texoma with my family.  i got up around 2-3 am to use the restroom and observed an orb on the oklahoma side of the lake at what appeared an inch above the ground.  based on the distance across the lake it was pretty high up.  i could see street lights on the other side and watched this orb pulse and what appeared to be "solid light" like a comet shot to the ground.  then a flash on the ground and the same comet like light returned to the craft.  it did this several minutes and i woke some other people with me and we all watched this thing for about thirty minutes.  it would then shoot a super speeds across the sky diagonally.  it was only inches from my perspective but must have been miles on that side.  it did the same thing with the pulses and lights.  it finally shot straight up into the sky and was gone.  that was 25 years ago and i am still in awe of what i saw that night. i worked as a police officer and with the military for many years.  i have no idea what i saw but the actions it took with the pulses and the very distinct lights toward the ground and then a pulse and back to the orb have left me dumbfounded.
content.summary: Observed orb shoot comet like beam to ground and then ground to orb

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:30 pm i received a call from my parents that live 1 mile up the road.  they told me to look west north west of hartford (we are south about 10 miles).

up in the sky were 2 lights that seemed to be hovering and almost looked like planes coming in to land. 

bradley international is more due north and the sighting lasted over 30 minutes so any planes staying on a straight enough path for us to not see any marker lights for that long doesn't make sense for this area. 

i could barely see them from my house the trees were blocking them and i'm lower on the mountain we live on. off my parents back deck is clear sky. my mom snapped a bunch of photos on her cell phone she sent me one. 

i'm more or less writing this report to hopefully help confirm what other people hopefully saw and are reporting.

after about 30 minutes my mother switched rooms to take more pictures and the objects were gone. 

i'm hoping other people had a better look or were closer.
content.summary: Saw two lights off set much brighter and bigger then stars in a perfectly clear sky

content.detailedDescription: Was looking at venus/jupiter conjunction, a bright blinking light caught my eye, it seemed to be near the handle of the little dipper and then i couldnt see it, about a minute later i saw it again, moving in a straight line, and it appeared to be as far off as the stars, and it would inconsistently blink sometimes bright and sometimes a little duller, almost like it was an engine firing to propel it, it moved from nw to north right above the treeline but obviously far out in space, it was like a satellite but blinking in random pattern, all i could think of was the boeing x37b, possibly it was that and it was its engine firing at different times?
content.summary: Looked like a blinking satellite

content.detailedDescription:
Had just left work, went home fed my cats and headed into the hospital to see my husband. drove in front road along the shore line of lake ontario. i noticed something shiny and bright to my right. it looked like a bubble, sort of see through but not, same colours as a bubble but metallic. it landed on the water but did not make a wake, the water was still, the orb took off very quickly along the pier, but there was nothing in the water to show that some thing was going through the water. 
the pier is very well lit and you can see that it was still light out, what  happening. a year earlier i had been followed in town along a street, i was getting off of a night shift, i was driving my bus back to the yard. it was around 3:45 am, it was a still warm summer night. i had my window open and i heard nothing, but i noticed that there was a light following me down the street. i could see nothing over me, and i could hear nothing. i stopped the bus and got out, there was nothing any where around me but the light was still there. i got back into the bus and headed as fast as i could back to the yard. when i turned off of division street it continued down the street, silent and not seeing anything/
then if we go back all of my life i have feared that some one was watching me and following me. i can remember when i was 10 years old i was in my bedroom with my next door neighbour, she was staying the night at my house. when all of a sudden my hair stood on end, my stomach felt terrible, i was terrified but didn't know why, then my room filled with thousands of little lights. no one i knew had a mirrored ball, i don't think they had them back then. we did not know where the light was coming from as we did not have a light on. i don't remember what happened that night, but i know we were not sleepy, and didn't want to go to bed, but after the lights, the next thing i remember is that we were out in the back yard. the doors were locked, and my window was closed with a screen over the window. the window were on an old war time house, where the windows were change each fall and each spring, they were not a window that even together we could not have lifted them off and gone out and put them back on. we went next door as we were wet and very cold and were afraid to tell my parents. i just get glimpse of that once in a while, i find it scary to remember the visits. my be i'm crazy, and it is just a dream? how do i know what i know?
content.summary: Landed on the water with out making a wake, looked like a huge bubble, same colours as a bubble.

content.detailedDescription: I was working as a security officer, i went to off the job to a short distant away to visit another security officer at a mall. we were both in our vehicles talking. it was a clear night, stars in sky very visible. i looked up to see the stars and i noticed right over head a large v shaped craft flying overhead. it was dark and had 5 round light on it. it was flying very slow, flying south west and i noticed no sound came from it. i yelled at the over officer to look up, but he looked at me like i was crazy, by the time he looked up it was just past his vehicle. i told him to get out and look at it before it hit the city lights and you couldnt see it anymore. he never saw it and reported to my boss that he thought i was on drugs. later i started drawing it on paper and showing friends what i saw, most thought i was making it up. later on i started a security job at a holiday inn and part of my job was to deliver first usa today newspapers to the priority club members. i noticed on the front page, was a digital image of exactly what i saw fly over mount vernon, il, it was the phoenix lights story. i showed the newspaper to those friends that didnt believe me. it was so visible, due to the clear sky, i could make out the shape, because it blocked out the other stars. i thought to myself, i was in the military and seen many air craft, i never saw anything like this that had no tail on the end. it was very wide. i stood up and put my hands up in the air to measure it, from where i was at my hands were about 3 feet apart. to this day, i dont know what it was, i cant say it is an alien craft, but something ive never seen before. if it is a govt craft, its something no one knows about. it didnt make any erratic moves, it flew in a straight line, slow, and moving south west, towards phoenix path. to this day, its bothered me, because i dont know what it was, but it was comforting to know many people saw what i saw in phoenix. all i can say is, i just want to know what it was, and was it alien, or a new human technology. the only evidence i have is its exactly what they saw in phoenix, the newspaper image on the front page is what i saw. i would be more than willing to take a lie detector test
content.summary: Large v shaped craft, slow moving, no noise or sound, no tail on end

content.detailedDescription: Using camcorder to film sky got a bird soaring with a white orb coming out from behind a cloud and it crossed the sky. i don't know what they are but they are fast and very real, not an insect, plane or balloon. thanks.
content.summary: Daytime orb with bird, see video.

content.detailedDescription: I went onto my deck to get some tools i left out there.It was clouding over and i thought it might rain.I bent over to get the tools and when i looked up i saw a large blinking object.It had what looked like a square screen on the bottom and the lights were flashing in a random or sequential order.Very very brilliant lights. red green yellow orange etc..Flashing .Then every so often it would do a weird strobe pulsating thing with just white lights.As i was watching the object it started to rain very hard and the clouds started to converge on the object.It rained so hard i was getting soaked but couldnt stop watching it.It slowly moved to my right and out of my site. the object didnt make any noise and kind of hovered in a wobbly manner.I have no pictures of the object but a person a few blocks away uploaded the event on youtube. type june 25 ufo over whalley to see a not great video but it is the exact thing i saw.It was with out a doubt a ufo i have no reservations saying that.
content.summary: June 25 2013 went out on my deck at 10 pm and saw a hovering blinking object with brilliant flashing lights no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Watching the sunday evening news.  6 minutes into program. a feature on north dakota tornadoes.  on the screen the verbage said "19 tornadoes/16 in north dakota/deadly storms escaping lightening.  while watching, a small brite white round object darted across the sky from the left of the screen to the right in front of the tornado.  it appeared to slightly descend. it was incredibly fast.  my husband noticed it first. we kept rewinding and it was definite.  i wrote an email last night to abc and have not heard back.  i feel that it is definitely worth looking at.  i saved it on the television.  it was the news that came on at 5:30 pst. i wish i could have someone watch it. thank you.

 

sincerely, 

jane aasen
content.summary: Abc world news with tom llamas. story on n. dakota tornadoes

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in front of my apartment building at about 11:25 pm trying to snap pictures of lightning from an approaching storm. i snapped a picture by a street light. when i looked at the picture i noticed above the glow of the streetlight was a dome shape with what looked like a white light or two in the middle. i did not see it accept for in the pic i took so i snapped 2 more pictures. the object never moved or changed that i am aware of.
content.summary: Snappd pucture if what may have been a craft with light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in front of my apartment building at about 11:25 pm trying to snap pictures of lightning from an approaching storm. i snapped a picture by a street light. when i looked at the picture i noticed above the glow of the streetlight was a dome shape with what looked like a white light or two in the middle. i did not see it accept for in the pic i took so i snapped 2 more pictures. the object never moved or changed that i am aware of.
content.summary: Snappd pucture if what may have been a craft with light

content.detailedDescription: Driving at the time. was taking photo of rainbow,
content.summary: Appeared and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: See short description details
content.summary: Heard strange sounds over my house, went outside answer saw strange circling lights about 500 feet in the air. moved from the aliso creek area of laguna beach and flew north towards newport beach.

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside at home checking my garden, and as always i was looking up at the sky and the sun as i have been observing unknown mysterious planets /objects  lately,  meaning in 2014/15.. and i have taken a few photos of that. 
 this time i noticed something different in the clouds, a black sphere, ball, it displayed a silver shine on top .( flat bottom, shiny on top).
 and i thought that's a ufo, not a planet. i was quite shaken for a moment, and stood in awe. it was the size of a basket ball at the time i was watching it from my garden .  it lit up from the sun coming through, like metal...Silver..  it looked as though was hiding in the clouds. i then ran inside to get my camera , came back and it was gone from where spotted it so clearly, so i ran back upstairs to my bedroom window and observed the same object moving sw over the ocean.. i took a photo of it and noticed another black sphere/disk moving from west toward the other object in a different position/ it looked like a frisbee....  when the sun came out they took off like poof! and vanished completely..  unfortunately the rain had the day before soiled my widow terribly, so some streaks of dirt is appearing on the glass side of the window in front of the shining object, but it is still seen clearly as described.
content.summary: On may 6th i noticed something different in the clouds, a black sphere/dome with silver shine on top, shortly after i observed another in a different position . i ran for my camera and caught both.

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo was discovered upon looking at the photographs after we returned home.  there is a definite object visible on the left hand side of the picture. we were astonished and freaked out when we looked at the photo on the computer.  we were in holbrook, az when the photo was taken of the sky with a storm approaching.

the second picture shows a trail slightly visible in the second photo.  we know that the northern part of eastern arizona is famous for sightings and abductions (travis walton).  this was only seen in the photos.
content.summary: This ufo was captured by taking photos of the landscape in northeastern arizona (holbrook, az)

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from my grandmother's funeral services exiting the 710 fwy (bell,ca).  i was in the car my husband was driving, my youngest sister, my nice and nephew were in the back seat.  it was already late right passed 11pm we had the moon roof open i was looking out at the moon thought the moon looked very nice it was kind of a clear night so i decide to snap shot a video of the moon. i didn't see the flying object while video taping i guess cause i wasn't paying attention to the surroundings and only focusing on the moon. i always play back the video before uploading it that is when i noticed the a green diamond shape object flying through the sky.  i screenshot the video so that i can zoom in since you cant zoom in on the video and it looks so clear a diamond shape flying object.  immediately i said omg a ufo!.  this is the second time i actually capture a ufo.
content.summary: I was shoting a videoof the moon when it just apprear at the corner of my video.  i think i captured 2

content.detailedDescription: I love and watch airport videos. i found an undisputed ufo during a portion of some footage from lag in new york city. shoots in, hovers for a second or two, zooms off in 90' direction. had many look at it and most said i should report it. can see what looks like landing pods (gear?) protruding from bottom. a320 landing in foreground. speeds off at extremely fast rate! i have been watching this video for a few years so i put todays date and time for this event but i am sure makers can tell exact date and time it was captured. i hope i am not the first to report this! it really kicks and will pick up sales when word gets out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Found on commercial aviation dvd

content.detailedDescription:
I was out back at work taking a smoke break around 9-9:15 at night.  i looked north to a warehouse that's been converted to an art studio where some kind of an outdoor concert or something was going on.  the few days before and after my sighting, lawrence was hosting a few different festivals with live outdoor music shows with stage lights and big screens.

i happened to look north of where i was and saw a row of lights that seemed to be blinking or pulsating in the sky to the north.  it looked like three lights at first and i initially dismissed it as an airplane.  the problem is that aircraft running lights do not pulse, and there are not three blue-white lights on an airplane.  there's a green light on the starboard wing, a red one on the portside wing, and a white light on the tail.  this object had a row of lights that seemed to pulse around it, running from left to right.  in fact, it may not have even been individual lights, but just a solid light that pulsed around the object (or maybe just a light, i saw no "object" per se, just the lights).  

when i realized it probably wasn't an airplane, i decided to see if it was just the reflection of stage lights on a power line from the outdoor show going on next door.  i walked up a small hill to test this, but the lights stayed where they were and were in fact obscured behind the power line.

the object was pretty far away it seemed and also seemed to be moving along the edge of a thunderstorm to the east.  it flew steadily and eventually vanished from my sight behind the tree line.  

i'm not really sure what i saw, but i'm bringing it to mufon's attention because i have heard that there has been a string of sightings recently around this area of north-eastern and north-western missouri and the greater kansas city area.  i read one post on facebook about the radios going out at harrah's casino and two ufos being spotted over the casino at that time.  apparently there was also a set of clothes found outside, complete with pants, shirt, and shoes, and nobody around, which i thought was bizarre and pretty creepy.  others have been seeing lights and objects in the sky around their homes in the kc area too, so i think that maybe this is significant and worthy of some greater attention.  

thanks.
content.summary: Pulsating blue-white lights seen in the sky next to thunderstorm, moving north

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed a large black 55 gal drum looking ufo with no sound. rotated very slow and had no markings. observed for around 5 minutes before being told to go inside by school principal who also witnessed event. happened at shaunee middle school in 1981. i have seen pictures of other similar craft, but shape was a little different. this for the most part was as described above, a very large 55 gallon drum rotating very slow with no sound and holding its position. had just finished a model rocket contest at school and was heading back in with my principal. we were the last ones coming in and i saw the craft and alerted him to it. we both stopped and observed for around 5 minutes before he sent me in. he stayed to observe, but never spoke about it with him after. the school is now indian hill elementary school outside of westerville and is located roughly 45 miles from wright patterson air force base in dayton.
content.summary: Witnessed with principal. black 55 gal drum but bigger. daytime and no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1.)driving west on friendship road

 2.)it was a bright light slightly over the treetops.

 3.) a street light, but only for a split second then i wasn't sure.

 4.) it moved away from us as we drove toward it and when the road made a 90 degree turn it stayed over the cow pasture in one spot.  as we continued south for a short distance we decided to turn around for a better look. at that time we noticed that there were three others like it and they began to zig-zag into the night sky. we sat in the car and watched as they came together and appeared to be one unit.  in a second it seemed like it was at treetop level again but i think it was much higher.  it was glowing and descending to where we could make out a saucer shape and green lights around it. it was slightly foggy that night so we couldn't see things clearly.                                              5.) we weren't sure what we were seeing although we new it was not a plane or helicopter because they can't move through the sky like we saw these things do.  also, maguire air force base and fort dix are about 35 miles south of where we were.  it might have been an experiment with the military.                                                                   6.) we left the area and went to get some friends of ours( it was 1973 and no cell phones) to bring them back to the area.  we returned about 45 minutes later with 3 car loads of friends but there was nothing in sight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Traveling west on friendship road when i we saw a light at treetop level.  as we got closer it moved west away from us .  the road made a  90 degree turn to the south and at this time the object was stationary over a cow pasture.

content.detailedDescription: We were at timber ridge school in cross junction virginia at the big lake with some of the students there. one of the kids called me and told me to look. i looked up in the sky and saw a white light shaped like a circle. it was just sitting in the sky and no sound. then it shot a beam of light to the ground for a good period of time, i don't know how long. then it just disappeared. the kids told everybody about it and my supervisor asked me what i saw and i just said i don't know. my reason for this was because when i got hired part of the paperwork i had to complete they asked questions about seeing ufo's. so i didn't want to get fired or get involved in anything. there were approximately ten kids out there and myself and another staff member.
content.summary: Saw a big ball of white light in the air just sitting there, then it flashed a beam of light on the ground

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were going back home. we had been over at one of my wife's sister house. as we were traveling back toward englewood, tennessee. as we got close to englewood we spotted and object which was cigar shaped just above the tree tops just hovering. we stopped the car and got out to get a better look. you could see porthole type windows with which appeared to have a human type being at one of the windows. the object started to move slowly. we got back in our car and followed it. the object turned toward where my wife's mother and dad lived. we turned up and went behind my wife's family home. as soon as it got over her parents home it just disappeared. our oldest son was less than two months old at the time. he cried all night and the next morning around 6 a.M. my mother came down to tell us that charlotte's dad had died that night. we have told a lot of people about what we saw and happened that night. it is something my wife and i will never forget.
content.summary: Cigar shaped about 100' with porthole type windows with a person like figure in one of the portholes
